org.jplot2d.element.impl

Class ColorbarAxisTransformImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jplot2d.element.impl.ElementImpl
      • org.jplot2d.element.impl.AxisTransformImpl
        • org.jplot2d.element.impl.ColorbarAxisTransformImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AxisTransform, Element, AxisTransformEx, ElementEx, Joinable

    public class ColorbarAxisTransformImpl
extends AxisTransformImpl
implements AxisTransformEx
    A colorbar tick manager always has a fixed AxisTransform, which always a NUMBER LINEAR axis type. The range will be set by PlotEx when commit changes.

      • setAutoMargin

        public void setAutoMargin(boolean autoMargin)
        Description copied from interface: AxisTransform
        Controls if 2 margins are appended automatically to extend the range to a pair of axis major ticks. The default value is true.
        Specified by:
        setAutoMargin in interface AxisTransform
        Overrides:
        setAutoMargin in class AxisTransformImpl
        Parameters:
        autoMargin - the switch

      • getLockGroup

        @Nullable
public AxisRangeLockGroupEx getLockGroup()
        Description copied from interface: AxisTransform
        Returns the lock group of this AxisTransform.

        In a plot, a plot axis must has a lock group, which includes this AxisTransform at least. After removing an axis with shared lock group, the lock group of the removed axis is null. Such an axis cannot be added to a plot, unless set a lock group first.

        The lock group of color bar axis is always null.

        Specified by:
        getLockGroup in interface AxisTransform
        Specified by:
        getLockGroup in interface AxisTransformEx
        Overrides:
        getLockGroup in class AxisTransformImpl
        Returns:
        the lock group of this AxisTransform

                AxisRangeLockGroup group)
        Description copied from interface: AxisTransform
        Join an axis lock group. The lock group must exist in the same environment, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        setLockGroup in interface AxisTransform
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

      • setCoreRange

        public void setCoreRange(@Nullable
                Range crange)
        Description copied from interface: AxisTransform
        Set the core range of the AxisTransform. The range will expand according to the settings of autoMargin and marginFactor, and derive an actual range. The given range can be positive (start < end) or negative (start > end). It has not effect on the property "inverted". All locked axes will follow the change of this axis.

        If user want set actual range directly by AxisTransform.setRange(Range), the coreRange will be set to null automatically.

        Specified by:
        setCoreRange in interface AxisTransform
        Overrides:
        setCoreRange in class AxisTransformImpl
        Parameters:
        crange - the core range to be set
